properties.entry: SELECT HOTEL_NO , HOTEL_WRITER , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_TEXT , HOTEL_SIZE , MEMBER_ID , FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME AS "TITLE_IMG" FROM HOTEL H JOIN MEMBER M ON (HOTEL_WRITER = MEMBER_NO) JOIN IMAGE ON (HOTEL_NO = REF_BNO) WHERE HOTEL_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY HOTEL_NO DESC

SELECT HOTEL_NO , HOTEL_WRITER , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_TEXT , HOTEL_SIZE , D_NUMBER , HOTEL_START , HOTEL_END , MEMBER_ID FROM HOTEL H JOIN MEMBER M ON (HOTEL_WRITER = MEMBER_NO) WHERE HOTEL_NO = ? AND HOTEL_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT FILE_NO , REF_BNO , FILE_NAME , FILE_PATH || CHANGE_NAME AS "TITLEIMG" FROM IMAGE JOIN HOTEL ON (HOTEL_NO = REF_BNO) WHERE IMAGE_TYPE = 2 AND REF_BNO = ?
INSERT INTO HOTEL ( HOTEL_NO , HOTEL_WRITER , HOTEL_NAME , HOTEL_TEXT , HOTEL_SIZE , D_NUMBER , HOTEL_START , HOTEL_END ) VALUES ( SEQ_HOTEL.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO IMAGE ( FILE_NO , REF_BNO , IMAGE_TYPE , FILE_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , FILE_LEVEL ) VALUES ( SEQ_IMAGE.NEXTVAL , SEQ_HOTEL.CURRVAL , 2 , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO RESERVATION ( RESERVATION_NO , PROGRAM_NO , FACILITY_NO , RESERVATION_PRICE ) VALUES ( SEQ_RESERVATION.NEXTVAL , SEQ_HOTEL.CURRVAL , 2 , ? )
SELECT COUNT(*) HCOUNT FROM RESERVATION WHERE FACILITY_NO = 2 AND PROGRAM_NO = ? AND RESERVATION_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE HOTEL SET HOTEL_STATUS = 'N' WHERE HOTEL_NO = ?
